system.description:
"" - Master minds, bend drones, limitlessly near.

You have an advanced Brainiac unit implant with enough power to function as a rigger drone control module, but it isn't as powerful as a normal regger drone control unitand has shorter range. You may control any of your drones within Close and at -2 on your rolls.

Requires Brainiac™ Base Unit.

"" - Master minds, bend drones, limitlessly near.

You have an advanced Brainiac unit implant with enough power to function as a rigger drone control module, but it isn't as powerful as a normal regger drone control unitand has shorter range. You may control any of your drones within Close and at -2 on your rolls.

Requires Brainiac™ Base Unit.
Brainiac™ Drone Control.name: Brainiac™ Drone Control
